results.content: Was very engaging for an intermediate level.. beginners need to read about the concepts ahead otherwise they will not understand what is happening.

results.content: Awesome React projects, I liked it very much. But this course is not for beginners.
results.content_html: Awesome React projects, I liked it very much. But this course is not for beginners.

results.content: So far it feels that the instructor just tells you what to write in your editor. Not a lot of explaining involved as to why we use Hooks or what some function actually does. Would not recommend this to someone who has not actually used a more than a little of React already
results.content_html: So far it feels that the instructor just tells you what to write in your editor. Not a lot of explaining involved as to why we use Hooks or what some function actually does. Would not recommend this to someone who has not actually used a more than a little of React already

results.content: Great Course. The instructor gave perfect explanations and was very helpful.
results.content_html: Great Course. The instructor gave perfect explanations and was very helpful.

results.content: Excellent examples with easy to follow instructions. Highly recommend.
results.content_html: Excellent examples with easy to follow instructions. Highly recommend.

results.content: It's really amazing course :) I'm so glad that I took it. I learned how to create various web apps and I would recommend it to everyone who wants to learn more about functional components, hooks, react context, and much more while creating nine full projects :) Great job!
results.content_html: It's really amazing course :) I'm so glad that I took it. I learned how to create various web apps and I would recommend it to everyone who wants to learn more about functional components, hooks, react context, and much more while creating nine full projects :) Great job!

results.content:
It's actually a great course. I loved all the different projects and I learned quite a lot.
Thanks for the course!

results.content: I love to learn through projects, so this course was perfect for me. I learned a lot about react hooks! It's nice to see the progression of projects.
